name: default-user-agent
description: Default user agent string for nodejs http request

scripts.test: npm run lint && mocha --check-leaks -R spec -t 5000 test/*.test.js
scripts.test-cov: npm run lint && istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --check-leaks -t 5000 test/*.test.js
scripts.test-travis: npm run lint && istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --check-leaks -t 5000 test/*.test.js

author: fengmk2 <fengmk2@gmail.com> (http://fengmk2.com)
